DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of ziprasidone during a long-term open label study in children and adolescents (ages 10-17) with Bipolar I Disorder (Manic or Mixed).
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Tolerability Of Flexible Doses Of Oral Ziprasidone In Children And Adolescents With Bipolar I Disorder (Manic Or Mixed)
DOC.criteria: The subjects must have received study medication in Study A1281196. In the investigator's opinion, the subject must be likely to continue to benefit from antipsychotic therapy and must have been free from any clinically significant safety concerns during the preceding double blind study. Subjects who require treatment with drugs that are known to consistently prolong the QT interval. Subjects who are judged by the investigator as being at imminent risk of suicide.
DOC.keyword: Children and Adolescents with Bipolar I Disorder (manic or mixed)
